mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (sender_id, chat_id, seq_id, type, text, create_time, update_time, asset_ids) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{chatId}, #{seqId}, #{type}, #{text}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{assetIds})
mapper.update: INSERT INTO chat_sequences (chat_id, current_seq) VALUES (#{chatId}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE current_seq = current_seq + 1
mapper.select: SELECT current_seq FROM chat_sequences WHERE chat_id = #{chatId}

SELECT c.chat_code AS chatCode, COUNT(m.id) AS unreadCount FROM chats c JOIN chat_members cm ON c.id = cm.chat_id AND cm.user_id = #{userId} JOIN messages m ON c.id = m.chat_id WHERE m.sender_id != #{userId} AND m.create_time > IFNULL(cm.last_seen_at, '1970-01-01 00:00:00') GROUP BY c.chat_code

SELECT u.uid AS sender, ciM.chat_code AS chatCode, m.seq_id AS seqId, m.type AS type, m.text, m.asset_ids AS assetIds, m.create_time AS createTime FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id JOIN ( SELECT m2.chat_id, c.chat_code, MAX(m2.create_time) max_create_time FROM messages m2 JOIN chat_members cm ON m2.chat_id = cm.chat_id JOIN chats c ON m2.chat_id = c.id WHERE cm.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY m2.chat_id, c.chat_code ) ciM ON m.chat_id = ciM.chat_id AND m.create_time = ciM.max_create_time

SELECT u.uid AS sender, c.chat_code AS chatCode, m.seq_id AS seqId, m.type AS type, m.text, m.asset_ids AS assetIds, m.create_time AS createTime FROM messages m JOIN chats c ON m.chat_id = c.id JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id WHERE m.chat_id = #{chatId} ORDER BY m.create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT u.uid AS sender, c.chat_code AS chatCode, m.seq_id AS seqId, m.type AS type, m.text, m.asset_ids AS assetIds, m.create_time AS createTime FROM messages m JOIN chats c ON m.chat_id = c.id JOIN users u ON m.sender_id = u.id WHERE m.chat_id = #{chatId} AND m.seq_id > #{lastSeqId} ORDER BY m.seq_id DESC
